ops.description: fade({r:0, g:0, b:0, speed:1, type:4, adjust:0});

showWindowWithDialog({window:1, dialog:20}); // {Cloud}
“Huh?
Keep you company where?”

showWindowWithDialog({window:1, dialog:16}); // {Cloud}
“What, just the two of us?”

showWindowWithDialog({window:1, dialog:8}); // {Aeris}
“Let's go on a date!”

showWindowWithDialog({window:1, dialog:11}); // {Aeris}
“Hey…a little touchy, aren't we?”

showWindowWithDialog({window:1, dialog:12}); // {Aeris}
“No, just a mixed-up kid…”

showWindowWithDialog({window:1, dialog:15}); // {Barret}
“Uh, I was jus' thinkin' of goin'
for a walk…”

showWindowWithDialog({window:1, dialog:17}); // {Barret}
“What's wrong with that?
Don't gimme no lip!! Just c'mon!”

showWindowWithDialog({window:1, dialog:3}); // {Tifa}
“I thought about what I was going to say,
but, it's kinda embarrassing…”

showWindowWithDialog({window:1, dialog:4}); // {Tifa}
“Hey, {Cloud}!”{PAUSE}“Why don't the two of us sneak out of here
and spend some time together?”

showWindowWithDialog({window:2, dialog:13}); // {Aeris}
“Oh well.
Come on, let's go!”

showWindowWithDialog({window:1, dialog:19}); // {Yuffie}
“Would you…keep me company
for a bit.”

dialogStrings:
{Tifa}
“I thought about what I was going to say,
but, it's kinda embarrassing…”

{Tifa}
“Hey, {Cloud}!”{PAUSE}“Why don't the two of us sneak out of here
and spend some time together?”

{Aeris}
“A D-A-T-E!
Or haven't you ever gone on one?”{PAUSE}{CHOICE}Don't take me for a fool
{CHOICE}Well, not a real one…

{Barret}
“Uh, I was jus' thinkin' of goin'
for a walk…”

{Barret}
“What's wrong with that?
Don't gimme no lip!! Just c'mon!”

{Yuffie}
“Would you…keep me company
for a bit.”
